page.title: 11CARDROSS _ RELIGION
page.content: {DENOMINATIONS_}THE VILLAGE IS LARGELY PROTESTANT, WORSHIPPING IN THE PARISH CHURCH WITH THE REV. ANDREW SCOBIE. THE MINORITY ROMAN CATHOLICS MEET IN ST.MAHEW'S CHAPEL AT KIRKTON. {ST.MAHEW'S CHAPEL_}FATHER O'REILLY WAS APPOINTED FIRST RESIDENT PARISH PRIEST IN 1978 AND HAS A FLOCK OF 120. THE MEDIEVAL_STYLE CHAPEL IS AT THE TOP OF DARLEITH ROAD. {EDUCATION_}THE ROMAN CATHOLIC CHILDREN ARE TAKEN BY BUS EACH DAY TO ST. JOSEPH'S PRIMARY SCHOOL, HELENSBURGH. SECONDARY PUPILS GO TO DUMBARTON, THE GIRLS TO NOTRE DAME HIGH SCHOOL AND THE BOYS TO ST. PATRICK'S HIGH SCHOOL.
